docs.snippet: In an Aug. 11 story about the defacement of a Jackie Robinson statue, The Associated Press erroneously reported the source of a $40,000 reward for information leading to a conviction. The money is being offered by two supporters of The Jackie Robi...
docs.lead_paragraph: In an Aug. 11 story about the defacement of a Jackie Robinson statue, The Associated Press erroneously reported the source of a $40,000 reward for information leading to a conviction. The money is being offered by two supporters of The Jackie Robinson Foundation, not by the foundation itself.

headline.main: Correction: Jackie Robinson Statue Defaced Story

docs.snippet: By one measure, stocks are on an almost incredibly long winning streak, yet many investors have hardly noticed....
docs.lead_paragraph: By one measure, stocks are on an almost incredibly long winning streak, yet many investors have hardly noticed.
docs.abstract: Jeff Sommer Strategies column observes that although stocks are on a long winning streak, long slog back toward the level of more than a decade ago has disillusioned many people; says even if stocks keep grinding upward, it may be awhile before there is much excitement about the market.
